sqlQuery.name: PartitionKeys
sqlQuery.sql: select source_id, '@PROJECT_ID@' as project_id, org_abbrev as partition_key from webready.GenomicSeqAttributes_p

sqlQuery.name: SequenceAlias
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT distinct a.sequence as source_id, sa.project_id, a.ID as old_source_id, sa.project_id AS old_project_id FROM webready.GenomicSequenceId_p a, webready.GenomicSeqAttributes_p sa WHERE a.sequence = sa.source_id

sqlQuery.name: Bfmv
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT bfmv.source_id, bfmv.project_id, lower(bfmv.project_id) as lc_project_id , bfmv.a_count, bfmv.c_count, bfmv.g_count, bfmv.t_count, bfmv.other_count , bfmv.length, bfmv.at_percent, bfmv.organism as organism_full, bfmv.is_top_level , trim(to_char(bfmv.length,'999,999,999')) as formatted_length , CONCAT('', SUBSTR(bfmv.organism, 1, 1), '.', REGEXP_REPLACE(SUBSTR(bfmv.organism, strpos(bfmv.organism, ' ')), '[[:space:]]+', CONCAT(chr(38), 'nbsp;')), '') AS formatted_organism , bfmv.ncbi_tax_id , bfmv.genbank_accession, bfmv.database_name , bfmv.database_version as externalDbVersion, database_name as externalDbName , CASE WHEN bfmv.chromosome_order_num is null THEN 'Not Assigned' ELSE bfmv.chromosome END as chromosome , CASE WHEN bfmv.chromosome_order_num is null THEN 'Not Assigned' ELSE bfmv.chromosome_order_num::varchar END as chromosome_order_num , CASE WHEN (bfmv.sequence_description) IS NOT NULL THEN bfmv.sequence_description WHEN (chromosome IS NOT NULL) THEN CONCAT(organism, ' - Chromosome ', chromosome_order_num) ELSE organism END AS description , bfmv.sequence_type, bfmv.has_msa , CONCAT('Data files' ) as download_link , CONCAT('@WEBAPP_BASE_URL@/user-comments/add?stableId=' ,bfmv.source_id ,'&commentTargetId=genome' ,'&externalDbName=',bfmv.database_name ,'&externalDbVersion=',bfmv.database_version ) as user_comment_link_url FROM webready.GenomicSeqAttributes_p bfmv WHERE bfmv.org_abbrev IN (%%PARTITION_KEYS%%)

sqlQuery.name: genomicGTracks
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT ga.source_id as source_id, ga.project_id, o.public_abbrev as organismAbbrev, CASE WHEN (ga.length>300000 and o.is_annotated_genome=1) THEN 'GeneDensity' ELSE gto.gtracks END as genomic_gtracks FROM apidbtuning.gbrowsetracksorganism gto, webready.GenomicSeqAttributes_p ga, apidb.organism o WHERE ga.organism = gto.organism AND gto.type = 'genomic' AND ga.taxon_id = o.taxon_id AND ga.org_abbrev IN (%%PARTITION_KEYS%%) UNION SELECT ga.source_id as source_id, ga.project_id, o.public_abbrev as organismAbbrev, CASE WHEN (ga.length>300000 and o.is_annotated_genome=1) THEN 'GeneDensity' ELSE 'ProtAlign%1EORF300%1ETandemRepeat%1ELowComplexity' END as genomic_gtracks FROM webready.GenomicSeqAttributes_p ga INNER JOIN apidb.organism o ON ga.taxon_id = o.taxon_id LEFT JOIN apidbtuning.gbrowsetracksorganism gto ON ga.organism = gto.organism WHERE ga.organism not in (select distinct organism from apidbtuning.gbrowsetracksorganism gto where gto.type = 'genomic') AND ga.org_abbrev IN (%%PARTITION_KEYS%%)

sqlQuery.name: GeneCount
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT sa.source_id, sa.project_id, coalesce(the_count, 0) as gene_count FROM webready.GenomicSeqAttributes_p sa LEFT JOIN ( SELECT sequence_id as source_id, count(*) as the_count FROM webready.GeneAttributes_p ga GROUP BY sequence_id ) gc ON sa.source_id = gc.source_id WHERE sa.org_abbrev IN (%%PARTITION_KEYS%%)

sqlQuery.name: IsAnnotated
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT sa.source_id, sa.project_id, CASE WHEN (p.dataset_presenter_id in (SELECT dataset_presenter_id FROM apidbtuning.datasetpublication WHERE pmid IS NOT NULL ) ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS is_annotated FROM APIDBTUNING.datasetdatasource dd, webready.GenomicSeqAttributes_p sa, apidb.datasource ds, apidbtuning.datasetpresenter p WHERE sa.taxon_id = dd.taxon_id AND dd.name = ds.name AND ds.type = 'genome' AND dd.dataset_presenter_id = p.dataset_presenter_id AND sa.org_abbrev IN (%%PARTITION_KEYS%%)

sqlQuery.name: PresenterInfo
sqlQuery.sql:
SELECT gs.source_id , gs.project_id , dp.description as attribution , dp.release_policy , CONCAT('' , dp.display_name , '
' ) as dataset_page FROM webready.GenomicSeqAttributes_p gs , apidbtuning.datasetpresenter dp , apidbtuning.datasetdatasource dd WHERE gs.taxon_id = dd.taxon_id and dd.name like '%_primary_genome_RSRC' and dd.dataset_presenter_id = dp.dataset_presenter_id and gs.org_abbrev IN (%%PARTITION_KEYS%%)

sqlQuery.name: SequenceGffSequence
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT gss.source_id, gss.project_id, gss.sequence as gff_sequence FROM webready.GenomicSequenceSequence_p gss WHERE gss.org_abbrev IN (%%PARTITION_KEYS%%)

sqlQuery.name: SequenceGffAttrs
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT ns.source_id, gs.project_id, ns.source_id as gff_seqid, gs.project_id as gff_source, s.name as gff_type, 1 as gff_fstart, ns.length as gff_fend, '.' as gff_score, '+' as gff_strand, '.' as gff_phase, ns.source_id as gff_attr_id, ns.source_id as gff_attr_web_id, ns.source_id as gff_attr_name, ns.description as gff_attr_description, ns.length as gff_attr_size, 'dsDNA' as gff_attr_molecule_type, --TODO add this back --SUBSTR(tn.name, 1, regexp_instr(tn.name || ' ', ' ', 1, 2) - 1) as gff_attr_organism_name, tn.name as gff_attr_organism_name, g.ncbi_genetic_code_id as gff_attr_translation_table, (CASE WHEN g.ncbi_genetic_code_id = 4 THEN 'circular' ELSE 'linear' END) as gff_attr_topology, (CASE WHEN s.name = 'mitochondrial_chromosome' THEN 'mitochondria' WHEN s.name = 'apicoplast_chromosome' THEN 'plastid' ELSE 'nuclear' END) as gff_attr_localization FROM webready.GenomicSeqAttributes_p gs, dots.NaSequence ns, sres.externaldatabase ed, sres.externaldatabaserelease edr, sres.TaxonName tn, sres.Taxon t, sres.GeneticCode g, sres.OntologyTerm s WHERE ns.na_sequence_id = gs.na_sequence_id AND ns.external_database_release_id = edr.external_database_release_id AND edr.external_database_id = ed.external_database_id AND ns.taxon_id = tn.taxon_id AND tn.name_class = 'scientific name' AND gs.taxon_id = t.taxon_id AND gs.so_id = s.source_id AND ( (t.genetic_code_id = g.genetic_code_id AND s.name in ('random_sequence', 'contig', 'chromosome', 'supercontig')) OR (t.mitochondrial_genetic_code_id = g.genetic_code_id AND s.name in ('mitochondrial_chromosome', 'apicoplast_chromosome')) ) and gs.org_abbrev IN (%%PARTITION_KEYS%%)
